rules_text:
Blockbuster 6 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap six untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
For each creature you control, create a token that is a copy of that creature. Then if this spell is a blockbuster, take an extra turn after this one.
Exile Temporal Anomaly.
